Flow.description: A flow to create a work log. Populates some data based on common outcomes.

formulas.description: Gives the last work log's End Time plus one minute for Gen Log creation.
formulas.name: date_time_latest_WL_time

formulas.description: Gives tomorrow's date at 3AM in date/time format.
formulas.name: date_time_today_end

formulas.description: Gives the current date at 3AM in date/time format.
formulas.name: date_time_today_start

formulas.description: Today's date at 10:00 AM EST (Converted from GMT)
formulas.name: today_at_1000am

formulas.description: Today's date at 10:30 AM EST (Converted from GMT)
formulas.name: today_at_1030am

formulas.description: Today's date at 11:00 AM EST (Converted from GMT)
formulas.name: today_at_1100am

formulas.description: Today's date at 1:30 PM EST (Converted from GMT)
formulas.name: today_at_130pm

formulas.description: Today's date at 2:00 PM EST (Converted from GMT)
formulas.name: today_at_200pm

formulas.description: Today's date at 2:30 PM EST (Converted from GMT)
formulas.name: today_at_230pm

formulas.description: Today's date at 3:00 PM EST (Converted from GMT)
formulas.name: today_at_300pm

formulas.description: Today's date at 9:30 AM EST (Converted from GMT)
formulas.name: today_at_930am

Flow.label: Create a Work Log

recordCreates.description: Create a work log with the provided data

recordLookups.name: Get_Latest_Work_Log
recordLookups.label: Get Latest Work Log
